mapper.sql: id, title, content, priority, sender_id, sender_name, notice_model, redirect_url, source_id, publication_scope, notice_type, created, updated, deleted
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from tb_notice
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tb_notice (title, content, priority, sender_id, sender_name, notice_model, redirect_url, source_id, publication_scope, notice_type, created, updated, deleted) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeModel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{redirectUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publicationScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noticeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update tb_notice
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{record.priority,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sender_id = #{record.senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sender_name = #{record.senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice_model = #{record.noticeModel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
redirect_url = #{record.redirectUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_id = #{record.sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publication_scope = #{record.publicationScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice_type = #{record.noticeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT},

update tb_notice set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{record.priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sender_id = #{record.senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sender_name = #{record.senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_model = #{record.noticeModel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, redirect_url = #{record.redirectUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_id = #{record.sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publication_scope = #{record.publicationScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_type = #{record.noticeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{record.deleted,jdbcType=BIT}

update tb_notice
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sender_id = #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sender_name = #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice_model = #{noticeModel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
redirect_url = #{redirectUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
publication_scope = #{publicationScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notice_type = #{noticeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_notice set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sender_id = #{senderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sender_name = #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_model = #{noticeModel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, redirect_url = #{redirectUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publication_scope = #{publicationScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notice_type = #{noticeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_staff WHERE school_id=(SELECT school_id FROM tb_school_parent WHERE id =#{userId}) and type in(31,35);

SELECT temp.student_id,temp.parent_id,temp.relation_title,b.name FROM (SELECT a.student_id,a.relation_title,a.parent_id FROM tb_student_parent a WHERE a.parent_id=(SELECT id FROM tb_school_parent WHERE id =#{userId}) and a.student_id=#{studentId}) as temp LEFT JOIN tb_student b ON temp.student_id = b.id
